mutants.code:
from queue import PriorityQueue

def calculate_min_comparisons(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, sizes) in test_cases:
        Q = PriorityQueue()
        for size in sizes:
            Q.put(size)
        ans = 1
        for _ in range(n - 1):
            a = Q.get()
            b = Q.get()
            ans += a
            ans += b
            ans -= 1
            c = a + b
            Q.put(c)
        results.append(ans)
    return results

from queue import PriorityQueue

def calculate_min_comparisons(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, sizes) in test_cases:
        Q = PriorityQueue()
        for size in sizes:
            Q.put(size)
        ans = 0
        for _ in range(n - -1):
            a = Q.get()
            b = Q.get()
            ans += a
            ans += b
            ans -= 1
            c = a + b
            Q.put(c)
        results.append(ans)
    return results
